title: BEAUTIFUL, PRIVATE, FURNISHED GARDEN COTTAGE (berkeley)
posting_body: ['BEAUTIFUL SMALL GARDEN COTTAGE FOR RENT - COZY, PRIVATE, SAFE, FURNISHED, with BEAUTIFUL LIGHT – behind historic West Berkeley home.', 'This is your "Henry David Thoreau" opportunity to live in a secluded almost-treehouse spot with both  a) quiet privacy and/or b) great conversation available in the Farmhouse Kitchen or on the decks/garden with respectful and friendly others.', '• Hardwood floors, Skylights, French doors •', 'Separate entrance •', 'Semi-Private Full Bath', '• Fully furnished (comfortable bed, dresser, bookshelf, table/desk, mirror, lamp, under-bed and shelf storage bins)', '• French doors open onto a small, semi-private deck separate from main house', '• Two kitchens, including a fully stocked farmhouse kitchen, and Laundry room are available and shared', '• Free parking on friendly, tree-lined street', '• Large, beautiful and peaceful fully fenced yard – decks, fruit trees, garden space, picnic table, sunny seating', '• Safety and security are a priority (Earthquake retrofitted.', 'Fully-fenced property.', 'Locked entrance gate)', '• Easy walk to Berkeley Bowl West (great grocery store), Homemade Cafe, other local restaurants, shopping, and parks', '• Easy commute to UC Berkeley, San Francisco, all freeways, several bus lines, BART and train stations', '• Easy bike-ride/ walk to Berkeley Marina and paths/ beaches along the San Francisco Bay', 'This home is warm, welcoming and respectful, perfect for someone seeking quiet privacy or a shared cup of tea and great conversation in the garden or in the farmhouse kitchen.', 'Current residents', '[in the main house] are friendly, mature, quiet, world-citizens who all get along well, clean up after themselves, and occasionally make each other laugh!', ' We range in age from early 20s to 66.', ' All are fully vaccinated and committed to a Covid-safe household.', 'COST: $1,550/mo Rent [+$100 for all Utilities, Wifi, and shared household supplies.', 'Note: $50/mo additional Utilities cost required November - March]', 'TOTAL =$1,650/month', '• Room is suitable for a single person', '• No smoking, no drugs on property', '• Friendly, respectful, responsible people.', '• We take Corona virus safety seriously.', 'All are fully vaccinated.', 'AVAILABLE:', 'August, 13, 2022 (some flexibility).', 'Short or long-term lease.', 'REQUIRED:', "Basic rental application; 3 Reference names with contacts; first and last month's rents + security deposit; In-person, phone, or WhatsApp interview.", 'PRIORITY GIVEN TO THOSE WHO EMAIL a paragraph or two about yourself.', 'Please include your 1) ideal living situation, 2) preferred move in date, AND 3) A PHONE NUMBER where you may be reached for a more personal phone meeting.', 'Welcome!']
